block.p: A United States military court in Germany sentenced an American soldier to life imprisonment without parole for the murder of an 11-year-old Kosovo Albanian girl. Staff Sgt. Frank Ronghi, 36, pleaded guilty to sodomizing and murdering Merita Shabiu while on peacekeeping duty in the Balkans. Sergeant Ronghi's sentence was the most severe one open to a military court holding a trial in Germany, where the death penalty does not exist.
